00021                 void closeButtonPressed();
00022 
00023                 // It is most likely that your program will be happy thinking of the window's
00024                 // content component as the 'base' level of the application; it can be responsible
00025                 // for storing and maintaining anything considered crucial to the running of the
00026                 // program.
00027 
00028                 // However, if you want to have anything live above even that, you may
00029                 // want to put it here. You may even wish to step further outside of things and keep
00030                 // some higher management system within the JUCEApplication class that drives the
00031                 // whole shebang, but that's probably not necessary, and can be tricky to maintain!
00032         };
